column3: “The best strain of cannabis if I had the ultimate say so, the true definition of dank. Purchase in large quantities if possible, as it can heal in multiple facets. Can you work out after smoking it? Hell yeah. Can you sit on the couch all day and play the Playstation? You damn right. I love it, truly, and if it was all I could ever smoke, I'd die a happy and high fella. Peace to all.”

“These nugs were dark and massive, fairly dense with a piney chocolate smell and covered in orange hairs and crystals. Overall it looked like the definition of DANK, very difficult to bust up too. But the high was something else, very uplifting and social buzz kicks in within a few minutes followed by euphoria and body buzz, powerful and very talkative high. A MUST TRY!! dont pass it up, its a beautiful strain!”

“I was diagnosed with ADD last year at the age of 19 and my life completely changed; unfortunately that included my ability to sleep. I've tried a number of pharmaceuticals to combat the late night effects of vyvanse (xanax and ambien to name a few), but they all just seemed to mess me up and still not do anything. I've been smoking for about 5 years but I never considered it as a sleep aid until about a month ago. Af...”

“For me and my girlfriend, smoking is a bonding experience. After each hit, I love talking with her, Whether it be about our day, us and our future, or life experiences or little things. This weed is GREAT for that, take your time with it, take a hit from the bong and let it take its course and fully hit you before taking another. Experience each kind of high. Each hit you take is a different high, so love it, stay in...”

“Apparently got ahold of some very very very nicely grown OG Kush and I truly have to say this stuff is insanely amazing. Amazing balance between Head and Body it totally hits yu both ways, amazing for Migraines, Stress, Pain & Spasms. A definite must try especially if it looks as crazy as my batch did.”

“This review is an update of a previous review I made a few months ago about our famous OG Kush that many consider as the god of cannabis, especially here on the West Coast. I first rated this strain as a 4 because the reality is, because of it's fame, a lot of growers planted this seed but after that only cared about money and the name so they ended up on the shelves with a somewhat average to no good product. Since ...”

“I don't know what it is about OG Kush and its ability to fight my pain. I have noticed that despite verying THC content in various bags over the past few years, it always calms my nerves and brings my pain to a level thats manageable. It has its own distinct terpene popping smell of pine and citrus that I believe play a huge role in its overall medicinal benefits.”

“I've been trying to find a strain that helps with my back pain and my insomnia. This killed two birds with one stone! I have a tic disorder, and this strain also has helped calm my nerves. It doesn't make me paranoid either. Great strain.”

“Best euphoria when it's grown optimally ! Great for pain relief ,  starts strong in the head but not racey and mellows into a heavy body buzz.  Oddly , I have had versions which tended to be more sativa but these were clearance deals .”

“Picked up a half O of OG Kush from a friend. It was not very good looking, mostly shake and leaves. Decided to make butter instead of kill myself smoking it. Decarbed it and simmered it for 3 hours then made snickerdoodle cookies bigger than my hand with the butter. Me and my GF split a cookie and I have never been more stoned in my life. I'm pretty well experienced in the edible department but these topped anything ...”

“Sense there is no info on Versace OG" thought I'd drop a bit of knowledge. It's OG kush x Sour D x GDP. I love most og phenos along with most hybrids and must say this is my favorite hands down . Just tried and for that matter saw for the fest time today and it's fantastic in every way. The different flavors upon inhale and exhale are delicious and for first time in awile I'm super stoked to find a strain I've never...”"

“SFV OG KUSH '88:

Wonderful come on! A warm, tropical tidal wave of euphoria carries you off oh so gently in it's embrace. Everything's soft, supple...literally feel embraced by a blanket. Soothing fuzzies cascade over your body. EVERYTHING feels good physically. The flawless, uplifted, and encouraging high would likely make sex down right transcendent.

Sound is easily the best I've ever heard (second maybe to Pre-9...”

“This is one of my all time favorite strains. Despite the fact that it's considered a Sativa dominant hybrid, I believe that it is much more Indica. The genetics are unknown, so I still believe that it's more Indica dominant. 

This strain is a perfect example of a typical medical marijuana strain. For me, it helps with chronic Fibromyalgia pain, PTSD, PMS, insomnia, depression, anxiety, migraines, stress, etc.  It'...”

“Favourite strain. Long lasting high (almost 7 with a redose 30 mins after initial dose). Good taste. Heavy stone. Good for sleep. Helped with my AD/HD and Tourettes syndrome.  Can get pretty trippy. The king.

OG... Original Gangsta (:”

“In my opinion, OG Kush is one of the standards that good cannabis should be measured by. OG is an incredibly well balanced indica dominant hybrid, with mellow, relaxing mental effects and a glowing body high. For me, OG is suitable for use almost anytime of day as it doesn't tend to over sedate me or make me paranoid or anxious unless I over-medicate. A classic, world-renowned strain that has certainly earned its rep...”

“Wow! Could this be my all-time favorite strain? I feel as if this is quite simply the classic stoner-weed. It's perfect if you need a few hours of sleep, or if you need to get through a few hours of work. This is probably a good go-to strain for anyone, no matter if they are recreational smokers, or strictly medicinal smokers. Love this strain. I would highly recommend you picking yourself up at least a half OZ if yo...”
“If you see this at a dispensary, just get it. It doesn't leave you stoned" and feeling down hours after you smoke. Clear head
column4: focused
column5: uplifted
column6: and just feeling good. It's strong
column7: but it's a very controlling high and functionable.”"

column3: “I'm a daily smoker so my tolerance is quite high. OG Kush, no matter what, always gets me completely and utterly stoned. Every single time. My favourite strain and one that I would highly recommend. I feel talkative, euphoric, and energized when it peaks, and I feel relaxed and numb afterwards. Great strain for morning use and also at nighttime before bed.”

“9/10 for me with this strain it's been very helpful for eating and for depression, i.e. No anxiety attacks or really much of any symptoms relating to my ptsd since I've been keeping this one in my rotation of meds. Recommending this highly to anyone out here looking for a strain to keep on their shelf that is consistent with inducing hunger. Buy this in bulk and thank me later (:”
“stress melter. ...relaxed and gets me aroused!! great for sex...”
“My favorite strain”

“Just picked up some OG Kush for the first time yesterday and it was my first smoke after a short tbreak. This strain is really great for just relaxing and spacing out, but it is really potent and has a partially psychedelic high so new or low tolerance users need to be careful. If you do have a low tolerance, 1-3 hits should be fine but a fat bowl would get you stoned as fuck”

“This is THE california strain. That lucsious, earthy, hoppy, pine smell is where it's at. The high is somewhat mellow, but not too relaxing, and it makes for some goooood times. I don't think it's possible to smoke OG Kush without getting a smile on your face. This is a must try if you haven't before.”

“Wow, this strain ranks right up there with the big dogs (i.e. Blackberry kush, skywalker, strawberry cough, ect.) Very great and long lasting sativa high, that flows nice and evenly into a heavy indica body buzz. Packed a nice size bowl, kicked my feet up, put on some music, and took 3 tokes and i was in wonderland, BOOM! Lol, very nice earthy, sandy taste, with a small lemon kick, very nice, smooth flavor :) very ni...”

“Wow, this strain ranks right up there with the big dogs (i.e. Blackberry kush, skywalker, strawberry cough, ect.) Very great and long lasting sativa high, that flows nice and evenly into a heavy indica body buzz. Packed a nice size bowl, kicked my feet up, put on some music, and took 3 tokes and i was in wonderland, BOOM! Lol, very nice earthy, sandy taste, with a small lemon kick, very nice, smooth flavor :) very ni...”

“This is THE california strain. That lucsious, earthy, hoppy, pine smell is where it's at. The high is somewhat mellow, but not too relaxing, and it makes for some goooood times. I don't think it's possible to smoke OG Kush without getting a smile on your face. This is a must try if you haven't before.”

“My conspiracy about OG, cause you know there are tons of rumors; its all about land strains and OG is the best of the best. I am aware there are many phenos but I believe ultimately OG is the case of exceptional breeding of the best Columbian Sativa and the best Afghani Indica. In some cases it might mexican sativa any case its primo equator bud aka Sativa cross with an Indica from The Kush mountains (afghan, paki, t...”
“I enjoyed the very distinctive flavor. if you enjoy the earthier tasting bud, this will be a treat. The euphoria crept up on me, and when it hit... ahhh... true relaxation... stresses faded away.”

“An absolute classic strain, and a must try for those new to cannabis. Good strain to have in your medicine cabinet at all times!

Earthy, woody, piney and on occasion if you have the right phenotype, a little lemony. It hits fast and goes straight to your head, leaving one giggly, spacey, and  with a permanent grin plastered across their face. 

Excellent for nausea, good for pain, GREAT for boredom or just hanging o...”

“My favorite or 2nd favorite, it's up there. This stuff always gets me medicated on the first hit. I love feeling the strong effects right away. So many strains out there now but OG Kush is always a go to.”

“Holy shit, most intense cannabis high I've ever had. Very enjoyable, very intense high but with no anxiety present at all! May very well be my favorite hybrid strain...hell, it might be my favorite strain of weed just in general.”

“I am reviewing the outdoor version of this flower, obtained from 61eleven dispensary, the drive-thru collective in San Diego.

The appearance is a medium green with few visible brown/tan pistils. Trichome coverage to the naked eye is very light, but under a loupe they are more apparent. The smell is a prototypical earthy, spiced, kush-type smell. Smell-wise it is nowhere near as pungent as some of the indoor OG Kus...”
“It is he most relaxing anti depression pill you can smoke and is one of the greatest medicine I have ever tried”
“Feeling good on this strain even on a lil nug. Helping me mellow out on this 7 hour trip from Pennsylvania to Tennessee so I like it a lot.👍”

“OG Kush x Bubba Kush: OG Bubba Kush
Type: Indica Dominant Hybrid 

Wow! I think I just found my new best friend. The aroma absolutely permeated the air. The flowers are beautiful and dense. On the porch with a left-hander after dinner: The smoke was thick and robust. No problems going down and no coughing. That's always a plus. I took 3 or 4 hits and realized I was high. The god damn I feel good high! The stress o...”
“OG Kush is the best for relieving stress and anxiety. Also helps with pain.”

“I find OG Kush to be REALLY strong. First, couple times I used it, I just smoked it straight. Just one small nugget in a pipe, about 5 good hits and I was stoned for a good 2-3 hours instantly, but I'm fairly light weight" when it comes to weed.

column2: then I used it to make bud butter. (Boil water in a pot on the stove
column3: put a glass bowl over the top of the pot face up. Put one stick of butter to every 3-4 grams of g...”"

“This one's a classic for good reasons. It will completely wipe out stress and leave you rather dazed and definitely euphoric. If you have depression or worry excessively, this may be just what you're looking for. I love the taste and the quick hitting effects. Make sure to try this cannabis star.”

“This is the second time I have had it. Liked it the first time. This time, it was certified at over 24%. This is 1 toke stuff. One would have been enough, but 2 was perfect for what I needed. Very relaxed but not heavy. To me, this stuff feels more indica than the description above. GREAT FOR PAIN, and I had a very nice sleep afterwards. Love this one.”

“This O G Kush is very potent and may be to strong for some inexperienced  smokers. It has a wonderful taste and aroma.It has been manicured and slow cured and I'm really impressed to see such loving care given to each bud. It's nice to see that there are people that  still take the extra time it takes to manicure and slowly cure their buds and should be proud. I am a chronic pain patient and this bud is a great pain ...”

“Grown well, this is a great bowl to smoke.....the smell takes me to the redwoods mushroom hunting in early fall......with my beautiful mushroom hunting stoner partner in crime......sigh <3.....it makes me melt into good feelings. What a great batch I got this time.”

“OG Kush packs a quick wakeup feeling and is probably why it's so popular. It has a piney beginning and a light, sweet, tangy ending. This strain takes you 🚀 to a really focused, thinking mode. Easy on the lungs; not prone to cough.”

“OG is a phenominal strain. I'm a Combat Vet with PTSD and physical injuries, and I stand firm with this younger, but certainly not lesser, Kush strain. I sleep better, I'm not so depressed or anxious, which is nice considering I have a large family. They can always tell if I haven't (smoked) taken my medicine. My rehabilitation through the last 15 years has almost definitely been accelerated, and enhanced by this flo...”

“This was the strain that started it all for me. I have smoked weed for years prior but was never so captivated and intoxicated by the scent before this strain. The high mellowed me out. I wasnt into strains in particular because this was when I was younger and lived in Cali and you got what you got. Eventually OGKush found its way to me and changed my life! I love love love this strain! The crazy thing is I have ADHD...”

“Hadn't been sleeping well. And did one bong hit before bed.  Good body and head buzz that kept me awake for 30 minutes.  Then slept right through to the morning alarm.  Fitbit says that's the first time in a month!”
“Not all that impressed with this Az grow....toooo many strains
column4: not enough time"...no significant pain/stress relief for my chronic conditions
column5: headbuzz missing. May be good for newbies and lower tolerance patients however.... on to BLUE HAZE for this 'ol stoner hippie chick😍  Be Well CannaFriends✌🚀”"

column3: “what i love about this strain is that it removes me from my pain ,(i still  feel it ,but its far away and not as important ) puts me in a wonderful mood ,allows me to work and focus and absolutly no paranoia (and i tend towards paranoia).”

“A great strain. Hits really quickly and very hard, super energetic at first and then sinks down into a very  relaxed high. Body feels heavy towards the end, as the high ended I started to get a killer headache, even though I was well hydrated,  maybe I herbed a bit too much. Still a good strain though.”

“Apparently got ahold of some very very very nicely grown OG Kush and I truly have to say this stuff is insanely amazing. Amazing balance between Head and Body it totally hits yu both ways, amazing for Migraines, Stress, Pain & Spasms. A definite must try especially if it looks as crazy as my batch did.”

“This is by far my new favorite strain. It tastes delicious almost like a woody vanilla with sort of sweet undertone. The smoke was a little harsh at first but it mellowed out after a few hits. The smell is really strong and has a sweet vanillaish earthy smell. The nugs are nice and dense and sticky and soft when its ground and when u crack them open there's so many crystals it looks like diamonds in your bud <3 The h...”

“Picked up a gram a few hours before the flight back from Amsterdam. Real beautiful appeal to the nugs, coated in THC and emanating a flowery odour. Smooth pull, great taste - exactly what I hoped for; real killer high to cure the inevitable holiday blues.”

“I can't say too much about OG Kush that everyone doesn't already know. Its some of the best stuff ever. Very euphoric/psychedelic for a kushy strain. Be careful not to smoke too much; I have anxiety disorder and I found this strain to basically activate it when it gets to the high potencies. Slow down on this one!”
“Extremely good strain! A definite reason for the rage. The high is something different, an awake" type indica (it is mainly sativa with indica in its heritage) that has the ability to both lift mood
column4: moderately stimulate
column5: awaken
column6: but also give an amazingly euphoric body high
column7: especially at higher doses. Puts me in just a happy
column9: content and interested state. Might I ad...”"

column3: “The one, the only. Often imitated but never duplicated, this has become notorious for good reason. So many guesses as to the lineage but imo id say something along the lines of Skunk (think RKS), Thai, Afghani (some type of hashplant?) or a mix of them. The full genetics we still don't know but Josh D and some others have come forward telling the tale of how she ended up in cali from florida and how it fell into the ...”

“if you want your anxiety, stress, and depression gone smoke this herb. It will also keep you aroused for a great amount of time. The best part of this budd is that sweet nothing feeling you get where your smiling and in sheer happiness for no reason.”

“I have extreme anxiety so any strain that causes anxiety I need to stay away from. I usually stick with indicas and some hybrids. I picked up this OG at my local dispensary and I gotta say it is amazing. It is potent, dank, thick, and has a nice smell. When I smoke this I can also do active things like work or run errands. It gives you a nice happy energetic talkative high. The only downside is that you will need to ...”

“This strain is amazing. By far the best shit I've done in awhile. I vaped this and was instantly hit with a euphoric high. Huge thick vapor clouds from my solo. A spicy wood almost piney taste.  Its mainly sativa but the effects are indica like. Couch Lock big time. Also another plus is the ladies really seem to like og kush. Makes sex even better along with everything else. Great strain for depression as it makes  y...”

“OG Kush is a good strain to smoke mid day good for Lack of appetite and pain. Tastes like i just ate a pine tree smells woody and super pungent, really Euphoric uplifting buzz that follows along with a really relaxing body high one of my favorites forsure, SUPER sticky fingers were like glue . I rarely give 5 out of 5's i dont know what to complain about amazing strain. 5 Out of 5.”

“The Overlord Og ( Og X chem dog x skunk) wow this is by far the best og strain I've tried and I've tried literally almost every cut that are relevant in any way. This is the straight fire ! Shout out to the Loompa Farms crew for this masterpiece. Knowing how many strains they have developed /stabilized I asked what is your fav cut - majority of ppl replied Overlord" the shatter is especially good. Living in humboldt...”"
“Very calming. Makes you happy and relaxed. I was surprised by how powerful of a body high it gave - you really start to tingle all over.”
“High quality bud, strong buzz, hard hitting. I recommend for those days when you need a hard hitting body buzz, this is easily one of my favorite strains of all time.”
“😐😤😤😤😱😱😜😜😃😄😌😴😴😴 that is what happend when i smoked this strain”

“I have been fighting severe social anxiety and depression for a good 20 years, I'm 32. I have been on at least 30 different types of medication and nothing has ever worked like this strain. It is a miracle plant that takes away all my anxiety, stomach pain from the anxiety so I can eat, and I can focus much better.”

“numbs trigeminal neuralgia
migraine prevention 
nausea control”
“Very calming. Makes you happy and relaxed. I was surprised by how powerful of a body high it gave - you really start to tingle all over.”
“The more I smoke og kush the more I like it. It's just such a good and relaxing high. The high is so well balanced. It makes me feel at peace and normal". It doesn't make me sleepy or tired
column4: which for me makes it a any time of day strain. This
column5: white widow
column6: and grand daddy purps are probably my three favorite strains so far. I upgrade the rating to a sold 4.5”"

column3: “Best strain I've ever had. Could not stop giggling and I was still functional.  Very fun strain”

“Super stoked to have this again, I've been smoking on this off and on for around a month now. It's definitely got that 'bang for your buck' factor to it, it has that truly unique stank to it that lets you know it's the real OG kush. Taste is great, a skunky-kushy taste that sticks around for up to 30 minutes which really surprised me. The high is super long lasting and it takes little to nothing to get you lifted. Th...”

“The smell is classic; woodsy, herbal and fresh. Not the most overpowering bouquet but that just adds to the pleasantness of this flower.

The smoke is heavy and thick and will make you cough at least a little bit, even for the veteran toker. The taste largely mirrors the smell, woodsy and herbal.

Effects are quick and happy. I felt very very uplifted and rather euphoric. A lot of energy, racing thoughts and an ever-...”

column5: like Chronic or Skunk

column4: NOT ORIGINAL GANGSTER
column5: OR OCEAN GROWN

column3: “A good hybrid with both head and body relief. Excellent for sore muscles after work. I like it because it isn't to narcotic and I can still somewhat function. Smells very pungent and earthy with a hint of pledge and wine. Taste is thick earthy pine with a fuel exhale. Flavor is top notch here couldn't ask for a better smoke!!”

“Just picked some up for the first time today, OG Kush is now one of my favorite Strains its good for night time makes me feel happy , chill(Lazy) and a good euphoric feeling so im going to smoke one more bowl and goo watch netflix and pass out and wake up tmr feeling soo good not tense in the back just over all relaxed and ready too smoke more”

“This is a solid smoke all around. A nice, though cloudy headed feeling and just an over all sense of well-being.

It's always a safe bet for a slightly energetic time. Nothing too intense about this strain at all. I love the smell of fresh hay that comes with the smoke.”

“Great psychedelic high while totally being aware and able to have a conversation. Great for stomach pain. No anxiety, no throbbing head, just a relaxed sedation. Overall excellent strain for body and head high, and great at relieving nausea.”
“You can't hate on OG Kush.  A strong earthy and piney aroma with dark dense nugs.  A must try!”

“Dense, heavy sticky bud with an earthy smell, and very heavy smoke to hit - it even makes us cough when vaporized. It takes a lot of concentration and finesse to smoke it gently without coughing hard. Other strains are a piece of cake to smoke after this. 

Those heavy hits come on slowly - take your time on your first few tries of the OG Kush - you might actually end up even more stoned (versus that sativa mental h...”"

“🍋🌲 O.G. Kush is like eating the best homemade chocolate chip cookie Grandma could ever dream of baking. Once you try it, other strains will always be compared back to this one. Truly a classic, the cerebral effects are consistent and amazingly beneficial. I consider O.G. Kush to be an anytime strain, as it simply does it all. Once you know what a true O.G. smells like, you will always want it! The smell is a lemony...”

“Pretty good strain. Great flavor/smell profile, and a really enjoyable, strong high. Started off incredibly talkative and interested in conversation, and mellowed out to a moderate-to-high state of mind wandering and body heaviness, a little on the sleepy side as well. 
The more uplifted phase had a lot of giggles, and the sleepy phase had some intense drymouth and munchies.”

“This strain is very relaxing  and helps with my ADHD. Tonight was one of the highest i have ever gotten, and the buds are VERY compact, probably half an inch tall & wide, and i had gotten this for the first time tonight, $40 worth. but 2 of those tiny nugs filled my .5g bowl. very dense, and extremwly potent. It is one of my favorites now for sure.”
“OG Kush is a very relaxing, lifting u up, making you more sociable.but still bieng relaxed”

“This strain is still king of buds for me. I say that as it is my go to pain and sleep aid. By far OG Kush fits me an my needs perfectly. With that said I would recommend this strain only with caution as I also fill its a bit much for some.”
“this the best in creative weed in the earth :d!”

Glad I got it from topgrademedical because they ...”
“OGKUSH is my all time favourite indica strain. Perfect before bed , so i fall asleep easily”
“Strong smoke gas taste when you inhale exhale is kind of fruit/gas great strain #Approved”

“OG Kush is a knockout strain.  It is very psychedelic and trippy as compared to the intense space highs of other strains.  It never got to the point of being overwhelmed, though three hits was enough.”

“I'm gonna give this a 4 star for only one reason (would be a five star otherwise): my fucking sinuses clog up like a motherfucker on this shit. But other than that, I feel happier, and I keep thinking of many different voices in my head and I keep kinda hallucinating. Listening to Crunch Time by Chris Travis (fucking SESH!) is a great experience. I feel like a million things could happen right now, but I also feel li...”
“This is a true classic and potent strain. The taste has a refreshing citrus appeal while pretty easy on the throat. Nice effects...great body buzz, a good one for pain.”
“Beautiful;  love this one;  it is quickly becoming one of my favs.”

“one of my favorite smelling and tasting strains. I'll try just about anything mixed with OG. It can sometimes leave a little to be desired from a body-high perspective, but it can ring your bell so hard you won't even think about your body.”
“OG KUSH!!!!!! Enough Said 🌲 Colorado 💚💛❤️ Keeps Us So High!!!!!!!”
“got a certified organic batch and it is dank AF.  solid sedative in mind and body, smoke some of this and it's bedtime”

“Easily one of my favorite strains.  It also finds it's way into the genetics of many other of my favorites.  A heavy indica, it's a go to for pain & relaxation at the end of the day.  I have a hard time using it earlier unless I'm having a chill day.  I always enjoy the taste, smell & look of the kush family strains...what can I say, I'm a big Kush fan.  Better for folks with a higher tolerance.”
“My favorite strain. The prices on OG Kush is always low. Tastes really good. Very relaxing mood and for some reason it gets you in the mood for sexy time.”

“This strain has the perfect ratio of body and head high. It is an amazing hybrid that leaves a nice relaxed feeling with a small pleasant amount of cerebral stimulation. Not to mention, this particular strain smokes very well, and has a nice flavor.”
“It's pushin you into the couch and you can't stand up again for like 2 hours. Definitely one of the best”

“Good all around high. Heavy hitting, long lasting earthy flavor, smells like straight up bud, there is no other comparison to the smell. Unmistakingly potent, good body high, great for pain. Yavapai Herbal has pretty good OG, but I have grown better.”

“i just smoked about half a joint of this stuff.. wow... this high is eurphoric, i just scratched my head and it still feels like my fingers are there. hahaha. pretty weird, but a good weird. listen to the song up" by wiz khalifa
column4: thats pretty much how og kush makes you feel.

column2: damn my mouth is dry. and i think my eyes are tooo LOL”"

column3:

man,”

“OG Kush: 
I'll start this review off with telling you what I'm looking for in a strain: I want it to fight my depression, anxiety, stress, and insomnia. I took two hits and I feel in a more relaxed but clear minded, clouds spread open type of way. After 10 minutes passed I took another 2 hits. Now I feel it coming 😋 hitting me slightly in my eyes and forehead like when a whale spanks its tail fin on the water 😍 I f...”

“Not good for my pain but good for getting rip-snortingly high. I use for chronic pain due to IC and for some reason this strain triggers a flare for me. Has a good flavor but comes with a wave of uncontrollable munchies.”
“OG is one of my favorite strains, the sativa part makes it a very good daytime high while the indica gives you the heavy buzz, one of my favorite strains”
“Whew!  What a tilt! I'm zoned what a excellent strain! This was like my 4th or 5th time medicating to this and It's the bomb.  You can function on this, I love that! A nine plus...”

“The batch of OG Kush I got to try had a very strong smell. The buds were the size of baby carrots, and we're quite covered in frosty looking trichomes. I enjoyed the flavor, and it has a quite a heavy amount of vapor (I use a pax by ploom). 
Finally, the effects vary from euphoric, to creative. A functional background high in the strain I used, I found myself very social and energetic. A must try if you're feeling a ...”

column5: interesting medicine.

column2: one long haul is usually measure enough to ascertain ...”"

“This strain is a classic. It gave me a strong BUZZ that was able to keep me functional and productive.”
“rapid heartbeat, and shakes”
“This hit me instantly. Great for any aches or pain. The high lasted a solid five hours. Also gave me the munchies like a MF'er. A solid all around strain if you just wanna relax.”

“Always a smooth and tasteful lighter feeling strain that great for desk work or a good slow burning go to. Shorter lasting then other similar strains, but not great for full body relaxation at all, it relieve tension but gave extra energy that could keep you up all night.”
“Great smell, great taste, and great medicine! A+++”
“Great. I have bipolar and have been in a manic depressive swing, this strain is euphoric, can get a bit cerebral, good for helping me get my mind out of the spin. Can focus on the music.”

“It hit me hard on my 3rd toke. The sativa effect crept up on me and it was very energetic. It fades into a indica phase and helps you feel very mellow. Very exciting and strong. Helped me sleep for hours. Also treats pain very well. Definitely a strain for anyone to try!!”
“rapid heartbeat, and shakes”

“Finally was able to try concentrate version of OG K.
This strain is fantastic. I'm relaxed and stress goes away immediately.  
Bud vs Concentrate with OG K. Some strains, I'd stick to Bud but for OG I would recommend concentrate because the effects are much better (personnal opinion) with the concentrate.
No side effect other than the typical glass of water after your hit. 
Really good with Stress, Anxiety”

“The smelliest weed I've ever had. Smoked too much of this, my first time ever smoking cannabis. Got sooooo ridiculously high I had some pretty intense open eye hallucinations, and don't remember 90% of that night.. Solid strain”
“Great Strain. I can go out and have fun(go to a party or go on a hike) or I can chill on the couch, and if I can't sleep, this helps out. It's not the best strain for insomnia but it works.”

“Good for stress. Makes me hungry short term, but long term lose appetite/nauseous. Very demotivating, slows time down, can be a bit depressing. Head high is replaced by a body high. “Very Very heavy aroma, comparable to that of Pinesol. Definitely a pungent, non-descreet strain that packs a heavy punch when opening a bag or jar, so be aware of your sorroundings if smoking in public or on the go. Taste was very earthy, woody, and organic, but smooth and flavorful nonetheless, followed by a lemon citrus taste that lingers after each hit. Absolutely beautiful and extremely dense nugs that were smoth...”

“I really like OG kush, and always have.  I rate it highly not because it's so effective, but because the quality of the buzz is high for an very long time, and is relaxing without necessitating couchlock.  The buds are tiny, popcorny kernels that are a deep, dark purple, with grayish green hairs, and has a peppery, but fruity scent to it.  Tastes fantastic, smokes smoothly, and doesn't burn overly fast.”

“Insanely relaxing high. After a few joints my self-esteem goes through the roof and anxiety and depression become almost non-existent.”
“This is an amazing strain! You will absolutely want more, and never be disappointed!”
“Today I tasted Maui OG, it is a hybrid of OG Kush and Maui Wowie, excellent mix, super relaxing and very active, with flavor of flowers and earth, and delicious aroma! I like it!”
“Great strain. One of my favorites”
“its a strong strain and definitely not a daytime smoke to this will fuck you up be careful if u do too much ur gone for the day”

“I tried OG Kush from Buddy's in San José,  and it ranks among one of the best I've tried,  and I've been a patient for over 2 years. It's a very comfortable body high,  and it mellows you out mentally,  putting you in a good place,  very relaxed. I recommend it for anxiety and depression. Or if you had a strenuous workout.”

“Great strain for just about anything. It's great at relaxing you and locking you in the couch or just hanging out with your friends or whatever. I got it in a BHO cartridge and it doesn't have too wonderful of a taste but it sure relaxes me and makes my stress just melt away and put a smile on my face. If you have too much then you'll definitely pass out but it's a pretty mellow high. I'd buy again if I want somethin...”
“Makes a great butter. Kicks anxiety's ass. The buzz does overcome stress and fear, leaves no room for over-thinking. You'll be too busy being stoned & happy.”
“Not much flavor via vaping.   If anything , it had a pick me up effect without the head high.   Boo on that.”
“Solid two hours observing new England fall foliage. relaxed hazy high.”
“only used it one time, but it freaked me out. I'll try it again to confirm”
“Helped a wide range of issues for me. Beautiful strain. Ethereal.”
“I vape and use sublingual og kush hybred  in florida FANTASTIC !!!!”

“Surprisingly I hit with a brief moment of anxiety, which is a rare and almost unheard of occurrence for me, however it only lasted for about 5 minuets, after this I was able to fully relax with a heavy body stone and uplifting cerebral effects! Nice tasting strain with a long lasting high!”
“Vaped concentrate from a cartridge. Very piney, lemony flavor. Smooth vape. Nice spacey head stone.”
“I really like it. It took me about 4-5 big hits and I was pretty high. It definitely made me go to sleep! All my finance issues went away and it's a great stress reliever.”
“The smell and taste are mediocre.  The effect is light at first and intensifies over the following moments into body relaxation mode.”

“Solid 5 stars. I quite possibly got higher on OG Kush than I'd ever been. It is most definitely in my top 3 and quite possibly my favorite strain. If you can get some, then GET IT. It will NOT let you down. Great head high, makes you feel light and very happy. It was just an amazing strain to have all around.”
“Fantastic, def a creeper.”

It's definitely not a weed I'd want to walk around and smoke, or be around people I don't know. It's for relaxing in a comfortable spot. Which is what I was doing and why I rated this a four.”

“Strong, earthen, heavy duty. Those craving a super stoned experience should start here. So psychedelic that I'm left snapping my eyes open as I fall asleep as if I have closed-eye visuals... Dense, beautifully cured bud grown indoors by expert Eugene gardeners. MMM....ZZZ...”

Effects creeped a bit, which I hope indicates a higher CBD level.  I do prefer a shatter with a good ...”

Felt like a 90:10 Sativa to Indica ratio. Buzzing...”

“og kush is by far the best go to everyday working strain I use it day to day to help me get through classes +rep faveroute strain”

“I would rate this an overall 4.5. Great taste of lemon and pine.  Great work time use, makes you relaxed, happy, focused and clear headed.  Great dat and work time strain. Obviously if you do enough sleep is great too.”

“I don't know what it was about this, but I narrowed down my first two Kush pickups ever to having been OG, and it's hard to match the experience to this day. 
Both times shit smelled of this beautiful, resiny pine, leaves SO much keef if you grinding.

“I've tried both bud and concentrate form of this, but I gotta say I like the bud better.  Very balanced hybrid, the effects overwhelm you soon after smoking.  Very uplifted, relaxed, makes you feel on top of the world.  A classic strain good for any event, OG Kush never dissapoints.”

“First of all, this stuff is DEEP purple and tastes amazing. I helped my friend move after smoking a large joint of it, and I felt alert and energized, which surprised me since it looks like it would be a heavy indica. Loved it.”

“First of all, this stuff is DEEP purple and tastes amazing. I helped my friend move after smoking a large joint of it, and I felt alert and energized, which surprised me since it looks like it would be a heavy indica. Loved it.”

“If you get the real thing, which for me was only once, it's phenomenal. perfectly trimmed, cured and crystallized. tastes sweet, with that awesome hashy kushy taste smell too it. The high is really perfectly well balanced and lasts 2 plus hours. It's a special occasion strain for me and newbies or anxiety prone should use in extreme moderation as it's easy to overdo it because it's so potent but even then this strain...”

“This is a very mellow  high... I think I could function all day on this as well as go to bed if I wanted to. Pretty functioning strain and I am really craving a Klondike bar. This would be a good substitute for drinking alcohol after a hard day at the office. This may not be as good for wake and bake but hey, maybe on an off morning where you are watching the price is right or something. Good strain perhaps for Thank...”
“left me fried after 3 hits”
“It was earthy and really lazy. I didn't enjoy the taste too much but it was a good strong high. Tight covered little nuggets.”
“Keep a beer near !”
“I <3 this strain.  It's the one that made me realize the difference between indicas & sativas.  Great body high.”
“smoked 2 fat blunts with my friend at a kick back and this strain had me feeling myself after 5 hits i was having an insane body high ogk a good strain for a chill day”

“Upon arrival of this euphoric strain of kush I immiedately knew I would be leaving earth's orbit. I quickly found myself sking through fond memories like a jet setter on the swiss alps. I smoked with a few of my comrads and the mood was animal house meets thats 70's show. The aroma and was natural sort of pine like very potent! I would definetely partake again, sometimes you need a trip a two off earth.”
“STRAIGHT FIRE”

“As you grind this very earthy bud up it's impossible not to notice its dark orange hairs and its heavy coat of tri-chomes. 
The first few puffs will give you a velvety, earthy flavor. 
The beginning of this high gives a very subtle uplifted and relaxed feeling as your worries seem less problematic and daily anxeities slip away. This bud also provides a very focused high, and may not be the best strain for the bed-tim...”
“Great for stress relief! Great head high with a stuck in the couch mode coming later or with too much too fast. Great for outdoors & going out & doing stuff.”
“Four Stars”

“Good strain for chilling out, not to sleepy not to energetic. But overall kind of disappointed, effects were nothing special like the hype may suggest. Still a great hang out and relieve stress after a long day smoke. frosty little beauties but not best bag appeal, on the other hand manicured well and hardly anything to pick out.”
“Just had some more and the peak high is quick and doesn't last near as long as I would like.”
“Awesome strain. made me feel really relaxed but I could still get things done. Great for both day and night personally. Remedied depression too.”
“One of my favorite strains!”
“best of the best”
“This is a great strain if you're wanted to feel relaxed, but no amount of couch lock: it'll keep you functioning but feeling upbeat. Overall, a really nice strain.”
“Loved it so much I bought the Leafly t-shirt for it!”
“Pretty well as day time use, the OG become really better smoked at high quantity so you see the disappear in a short lapse of time, but in the facts, OG is a great strain.”
“It perks me up a bit and makes me a bit giggly, which can absolutely be fun for a relaxed evening, but the effect is only superficial and it dosen't reduce anxiety or improve mood much.”
“ok”

“Quite happy with this strain in evape. It is a nice hybrid leaning slightly towards Indica. Its relaxing and works well in social situations without being sleepy or debilitating. I also found it worked well quell my anxiety - in contrast to some strains that seem to amplify anxiety.”
“Laughed my ass off for hours, highly recommended.”
“This is some real dope shit right here”
“Nothing much to say, the best strain so far to explore new things and enjoying it .”
“This strain is one of my favorites, top shelf. Best of both worlds pretty balanced out to get what you need to get done through out the day. Properly medicated.”
“Great, definitely get increased appetite. Not too bad with pain relief.”

“smoked a couple of jays with my friends one day. Takes a while to set on, but it's a very relaxing high that doesn't hit you too hard. you should feel euphoric but social, almost like you're more connected with the world. Great for munchies, sleep, or whatever it is you like to do when you're high. a very calming strain, good for going out and enjoying nature, nothing too strong. in fact, this would probably be a per...”
“nice smell...good stone....lacks that scent when I return to thy room”

“Genuinely just feel really happy. Made me smile for no reason and ponder the little things in life. Great for stress relief and good vibes. Only downside was, got a little paranoid. Almost more like restless. Still, 5/5 :)”

“OG is always a great strain. whether it be the Sativa Dom or the OG Kush.  flavor is almost like no other. you can tell the strain right off the bat just by its strong, pine taste. great strain for sleep, depression, anxiety. OG Kush has infiltrated my Top 10 for best strains I've ever smoked.”

“First time using og kush, I normally pick up kush style strains so thought I knew what to expect from this. Buds were light green with snowy peaks, slightly sticky with resin but ground up well. Had quite a berry smell to it along with pine, lemon and diesel which I was not expecting. Pine earthy taste on the exhale along with a slight fruitiness. The strain I have must be indica dominant as quite a couch lock effect...”
“Super crystally, nice smoking weed. I got this for my dad when he asked me to go to the shop for him.”
“I forgot!”

“great happy mood lifter 
very earthy weed smell" strong weed odor . smells like pine. out doors smell . strong . very potent . very good social bud . good for talking . makes you happy and laugh

column1: I had OG Kush 1 from green cross of Cherry Creek in Denver”"

column3: “I get this often and I have to say Its done narley chronic”

.”

I can honestly smoke this same strain forever”

“I purchased the Vapen brand syringe OG Kush extract at Herbal Wellness Center in Phoenix. This is my first time using this product. I made this purchase to reduce my medical issues and to switch to a cleaner form of med. I found that this product delivers good clean medicine and one syringe will equal about 1/8 to a 1/4 of flower meds for my back issues.”

“I purchased about 10 grams of OG kush yesterday and am impressed. The weed is good, very dense and very smelly. My friend and I smoked a bowl and a half, and we definitely felt blazed afterwards. I wouldn't pass this up.”

“nice”
“This strain is great. You're calm and think happy thoughts. You also feel in control with this strain. One of my favorites.”

my favorite is from Dinafem Seeds”

“smoked this beauty again. still my top fav.  smells like pine and citrus. this bud burned perfect, better than my first.  still very tough to grind and super hot burn. but its well worth it. effects were a very relaxed, chill, not so talkative body high.  and munchies is a big factor. kept me asleep and had super long amazing dreams c:”

“Absolute best strain I've had hands down. The earthy smell of OG Kush is extremely enjoyable but also potent. You'll need a smell proof bag if you're hiding this one, guys. The taste is pretty good, but can get harsh in large hits. As for appearance, think green. Like, the hulk green. Super sticky bud, makes rolling easy. I'd say use a bong or pipe piece with this Kush. You'll want to savor as much as you can, blunts...”
“My girlfriend and I smoke this strain, then make some good food and watch TV. Great thing about this strain is you can still be productive even after quiet heavy use. DEFINETELY RECCOMEND”

“Really nice earthy taste, smells super natural, i love it! Obviously its one of my favorite strains and the second best Kush I smoked so far. After around 5-10 minutes it kicked me, giving me a warm hearted and a typical Indica Stoned feeling, with a slightly high in behind. It's nice in the evening, for sleeping or watching films. It's not to nice if you wanna have good conversations I felt quite to slow to talk muc...”

“Its my favorite strain .

 but I notice my effects are different then others.”

“Kinda makes me sleepy. Heavy indica qualities for a hybrid. Good for relieving muscle pains.”

“Damn...that's all I gotta say. It's crazy dense, won't hold a cheery and has a bold taste. But, I gotta say it has me goin. I'm pretty off.  It's both a cranial and physical high. “I really liked OG Kush. I picked up close to 10G last summer and smoked it all in one week. It was really strong and the one I got was really sticky and nice. “Picked up a gram yesterday on the first day of rec sales here in Oregon. At %29.62 this had me completely on my ass after just 2 good bong rips. Knocked me out cold and I slept like a rock until my alarm the next morning. I'm a veteran smoker and was very pleased with the punch this strain carries. 5/5”
“Head high, short lasting high.”
“Quickly effect, I was flying for hours!  I love this shit”
“Wow! Very energizing. Made me extra chatty.”
“I am incredibly lucky to have come upon a grower in my area with a record breaking crop and when it is gone, I will be very sad.”

“OG Kush is King! After a shitty day of work it really relieved my stress. I also have ADHD and it really helps keep me focused. The high lasts for a good period of time and it does have that signature mountain" smell of pine
column4: wood with earthy undertones. Another keeper!”"

column3:
“OG Kush weed is top of the line, all the way. It has a very unique taste, scent, look, feel and high. When properly grown and dried, its leaves are nearly neon green and are just a treat to look at.

OG Kush remains as one of the most in-demand strains of medicinal cannabis. Rock stars, movie stars and every day hippies all enjoy it's sticky feel, aromatic sent, crystal-covered buds and way-stoney high.

It's one of ...”
“great tasting og cut from chr”

“such a nice strain. not something I would smoke everyday even tho I have for the past week. Haha. but I say that cuz In the beginning of the week I could really feel the intensity of my pain rise while working. I honestly became very weak, it's definitely a couch locker so get comfortable while enjoying it. It also has a very distinct taste and sour scent that you can only recognize as OG. love this stuff. been feeli...”
“Sneaky high, hits you about 5 minutes after you start smoking. Love it. Solid 9/10.”
“the best strain, taste, high, organoleptic. Everybody enjoy this beauty plant.”

“Who can argue with the classic OG hybrid America has fallen in love with? Kush parentage results in a beautiful, full bodied  bud as well as a smooth, bodacious, and natural taste. Easily identified by its piney scent, a lengthy orange hairs. Provides an excellent cerebral buzz, and pain relief, making it wonderful option for those looking for pain relief during the day without the couch lock, or those simply looking...”
“great relaxing high.”

“SFV OG Kush, baby! Stress smasher, mind masher, comfort catcher. I love this strain. I have 1 gram left from Diamond Canna, and I am saving it for when my budtender can get more! Amazing concentrate, or flower.”
“relaxing and calming. clear headed. headache greatly reduced. muscle pain has decreased but still noticeable.”
“Seriously good stuff, felt so chilled on this one although I believe I woke up with a bit of a headache, but I put that down to dehydration.”
“I couldn't stand but still wanted to get higher. Pretty fun strain though”
“Nice body high with a nice pine smell def one of my favorites”

“I just added this to my menu and tried it for the first time. I really searched for the right words to use so I could paint an accurate picture for my patients. Basically all I could come up with is- I got really stoned and played star wars battle front and it was awesome. I love this stuff!”
“This strain is one of the best I've ever had. A high like no other.”
“Very uplifting, no anxiety or paranoia. Great taste and earthy smell. Very smooth to smoke. Great sleep afterwards.”
“Classic pot. Everyone has smoked OG whether they've known it or not. As soon as you smell it you'll remember that you can't go wrong with OG kush”
“great strain very piney and uplifting, great to have after a long work day. It gives me pretty bad cotton mouth but all in all it's great.”
“perfect strain for social events such as a chill or sqaud chill relaxed yet allert. became my daily morning strain”
“Euphoric´d & relaxed ;)”
“OG is my absolute favourite right now.  It's long lasting, steady and relaxes me.  Perfect for stress.  It puts you in a great place.  Highly recommended.  👌🏻”
“Relaxing with elevated high.  Puts me to sleep with great dreams feeling refreshed.”
“Great strain. Great for my insomnia.  Tried to do some in the daytime....got NOTHING done. otherwise, great vibes.”
“Helped me with stress and anxiety a lot. I felt relaxed and happy.”

“The OriGinal. i love this strain.  it makes you feel really relaxed , your body muscles melt, heavy eyes . happy and your stress-free!. i have such a great day when i smoke OG . it really helps my anxiety and depression.  if you haven't tried it. you should, i highly recommend it:>”
“This strain is amazing!!! Im high right now with it and its just a very energetic, giggly high, I feel my head lighter than a balloon, great shit.”
“Heavy and great for a couch lock”
“I don't think I can say anything about this strain that has not already been said by the shit ton of other reviews... So I will just simply say.... This is one of the best strains out there.”
“Feeling good on this strain even on a lil nug. Helping me mellow out on this 7 hour trip from Pennsylvania to Tennessee so I like it a lot.👍”
“honestly OG kush is my favorite strain it doesn't get any better then the original lemony zesty taste with a that strong dank after taste that's what Ganj is suppose to taste like”
“real good shit”
“one of my favorite go to OG strains hands down”

“This brings strong euphoria soon after  tasting earthy pine aroma. I felt very relaxed and comfortable, which led to good quality of sleep. Also, It made me laugh a lot when I was watching a guy who was mimicking President Obama very accurately on VICE.”
“Not very memorable, overrated.”

“what else can be said about the fresh cut grass crystal meth and bleach that comprise this blend with the piney southern freshness of this Pennsylvania-Kentucky blue grass of an unknown origin what ever legend you believe know this shit is sasquatch...”
“Always a good choice relaxing”
“I use this to help me sleep at night. Works very well - I've stopped taking my insomnia medication in favor of this.”

“This stuff is FINE.  My roomie picked up some of this recently and we had ourselves a time.  Amazing flavor, super-relaxing, made me feel like I was made of fuzzy puff-balls. “I've been goin to dispensaries for years & got it a few times thought really nothing spectacular about it, I got to Affinity in Denver and I decided to get an eighth it tested @ 34.66 THC well I just smoked a bowl WOW amazing I'm super relaxed tasted earthy which was great let's just say I'll be getting this whenever I re up, but gotta be dank as F even though its potent great beginner strain right next to GG4, Chemd...”

“A good and calm high. Something I am very happy with and will continue to use. It makes you feel good, but not in your head that you can't enough the high and you can get some relief from chronic pain as well. It is so easy going that I feel like I can function with it in anything I do.”

“Smell : peppery pine and gsc like aromatics
Taste : piney, woody, with hints of spice and lemon good salivary reaction and aftertaste 
Effects : alert, focused Sativa characteristic with hazy stony buzz that can leave the uninitiated feeling disoriented. Sits you down before and after it motivates and moves creative parts of the mind”
“Without a doubt in my top 5 of my favorites. And that order changes with the day”
“Pretty wild high but relaxing.”

“Legendary strain, great pungent odor and also a great thc profile one e of the most crossed and most phenoes in California today in fact OG kush has been apart of the hype for years it makes up for 3/4 of the population of cannabis in California right now it's kinda like how skunk was when I was a teenager everyone bred with it but I do have a soft spot for OG kush but I do believe because of the OG kush hype we have...”
“perfect”
“never been let down by og”

“Many people i’ve talked to consider this one of the best strains they have ever tried. Although I can’t go that far, this is a super good hybrid that is very relaxing. It helps with anxiety incredibly well but smells strong so be warned.”
“Very good strain, obviously a classic. Smells alright, smokes well and great high. The Nuken is much better for value tho.”
“Best strain for anxiety ever”
“OG Kush is definitely a better tasting strain. Little hazy but not uncontrollable. I remember getting hungry.”
“I have never had something put me to sleep more easily than this.”

“Legit this is my go to weed when feeling shitty or hanging with friends. I got so high after ripping two bowls that I just was energetic for the whole night, then I went on a freestyle thing, while my other friends who also smoked were eating cereal. This is the best weed that you can get, effects are great, and the smell is the greatest thing in the world. 100% would recommend you try it.”
“Kicks in real hard and is a super fun high!”
“It has a nice uplifting vibe, you may get a little energy boost, gain a strong focus, or just be deep in thought sitting their lol. Of course to follow is a strong appetite.”

“Trulieve has the best ogk
And the best for ptsd and anxiety and mix it with sour diesel is a great salad 
But Any kush is great but the best is always ogk!”

“Not a lot to say about the strain it’s ol reliable. If your looking to get high it’ll get you there and for me the effects tend to differ depending on my mood and the situation I’m in. “First impression: Sweet greeny naturery smell. Orange strains, fluffy buds. Great flower

Consumption: Placed in an average hand bowl and lit with a BIC lighter. Lit on outside by edge. Boy did this burn nicely. With the first light 3/4ths of the bowl was burned. It burned slow but every time I went in to clear the chamber, the flame gently traced into the bowl. Burned very nicely

Reaction: i have a pretty high tole...”
“Not too memorable, nice functional high”
“Wonderful ❤️ I'm depressive and this beauty let me feel way better! 👍🏻  ***** Stars”

“Carl is in a cult, /

“cant go wrong”
“Good for thinking”

“12$ 1g OG Kush BHO 73.75%

REALLY EUPHORIC HAPPY HAPPY GO GO FUN TIME this gram was twice what I spend usually but a single dab and you're medicated twice as long. Has the kind of cerebral sativa high where you don't see the devil when you smoke too much.”
“One of my all time favs. A very nice, smooth and mello high.”
“If you see this in a dispensary please grab some!! The OG Kush I get is CBD and it works wonders. The smell is subtle but sweet to me. This is a popular strain for a reason”

“A good quality strain, can and will mess up you're mindset a dissorient you majorly if smoked in large amounts, however is very pungent and has a earthy taste with a somewhat wooden aftertaste. Something I would enjoy smoking on in a regular basis.”
