“Smoked a bowl of this to myself before i went out with some friends, and it made the whole rest of that day so much better. I love this strain, it just works great for me. (:”
“great smoke. high lasted long.  great dense buds. awesome smoke for a nice evening at home.”

“This is possibly one of the best strains I have ever smoked. I have only had pure OG Kush once, and I loved it. Last night I smoked some OG Kush that my friend grew hydroponically. He said it was not pure OG and that he bred it with an indica. The indica effects were not too heavy and it was a very well balanced strain. The bud, though a cross breed, looked and smelled just like OG, which is nice because I love the a...”
“very good weed got me super high but my eyes got all tingly and I was very tired”
“It doesn't take much to get a buzz, but once it has set in, the laziness is overwhelming.”
“Only took 2 blunt hits and it was good, but the high didn't last long.”

“What can I say other than, ocean grown is great! From that chem dawg coffee taste to the smooth exceptionally flavorful exhale. A staple in any good stash. King size this ish, no filter!!! I love cali! Im a 80's babie cali kid. Oh, I thought u thought...”
“normal looking bud with unordinary odor. glues me to my chair. had no balance. was paranoid which brought on a little stress. pretty strong high. best used at night rather than early in the day.”

“Definitely took away my stomach aches and pains.It's strong and the high is long lasting but I'm not impressed,for as much as I heard    about it I thought it would knock my socks!  5 hours since I've eaten and pray it doesn't hurt.  will see”
“Very chill with one bowl. Gregarious and relaxing. Smoked another bowl and got headache and very dry eyes. Made me very sleepy.”

“This is a clasic strain, and it didn't dissapoint.  The smoke was somewhat harsh, but provided an awesome body high almost immediately after the first toke.  There is a reason this is one of the most popular strains out there, and it fulfilled my expectations completely.  Great strain.  You won't be dissapointed.”
“Had an awesome time hotboxing on a long drive. Had no clue where I was haha”
“So dank and it was fun working out while high. The music was like boom boom boom.”

“1st time having smoked anything in almost 21 yrs. Was told this would help relieve anxiety n stress. I thought i was gonna die with 1/2 a very small bowl. Make sure you know what the dispensaries are giving you b/c this is NOT what i signed up for, the Indicas, Hybrids and Sativas were all marked wrong in accordance with this sites info. Next time Im cross referencing all the info. I was stoned off my a$$ and had to ...”

“Really mellow clear headed high. My friend and I talked for hours while playing random games on our phones and talking about why stuff is the way it and just thinking about the shit there is yet to be discovered.”

“This OG Kush i've picked up has to be my favorite OG so far. The buds were a darker brown almost purple. They didn't look the best, and my friend actually got a bunch of popcorn nugs which aren't bad but like I said they just didn't look great, but somehow I still knew they would be dank. The smell was a very nice piney scent and it had a pleasant taste as well that I truly enjoyed. These buds give you a higher feeli...”

“It's strange, because the first time i smoked this kush, the flavor was more like a haze, then i realize that the effect takes like 30-40 minutes, the haze it's longer... good plant, greetings from here.”
“This strain has popcorn buds of a very dank, resinous and deep skunk type aroma. It is a very good smoke for relaxation, insomnia, or just chilling out." It also has a strong pain relief index
column4: compared to a heavy body high. Not recommended for those with anxiety/depression in my opinion since I suffer from both and received no relief in these areas. Not much paranoia
column5: but there is definitely some. A good smoke and ...”"

column3: “OG is quite the strain of choice in my book. It has a sweet pine smell/ taste with a strong aroma to make you drool. I love the many strains of OG KUSH!  -Had many kinds of OG and Green Light Alternatives had some incredible Lost Coast OG!-”
“Listed as top 3 my books. Never had weed that will get my high off if a dime alone.”
“Great ! Now my favorite”
“Really nice to wake and bake, good day to day when you still wanna get shit done.”
“I will wait around for this strain. It is one of the few around that I will pay street price" for. It works wonders.”"
“Sorry, forgot to rate it. Five stars. 👍👍”

“Five star strain! Leaves you with nothing but good times ahead, and no red eyes whatsoever! I rate this bud 5/5. It has a wonderful earthy flavor and leaves you feeling over all relaxed, euphoric, happy, and giggly. One of my favorite strains!”
“Very strong right at the first hit. You feel high almost instantly, potent.”

“OG Kush is a great strain if you want to do relaxing activities such as drawing, yoga, or knitting; any sort of physical hobby. It is perfect for doing anything productive right before going to bed. Keep in mind it does make you a little hungry, but for me personally it was controllable. 

Excellent before bed" nighttime strain!”"
“that was my first ever tipe of weed and it was amazing”
“Really potent, pretty good high, made me in a really mellow mood, also helped me focus”
“Started out very dreary and tired but gradually became happier and in an overall great state of mind ! I didn't feel high I felt zen”
“Physically gone after smoking this. It's an amazing head high that will make the toughest geek/trip out.”
“It's a good earthy high I'm on it right now and my body has that good relaxed feeling but it dumbed me out for a second I was studdering slurring words and shit”
“Strangely I feel less OG smoking OG....”
“West Coast Classic”
“you can never go wrong with this strain, always my first choice. A nice relaxing, mellow high.”
“I think its overrated but its still very dank, I bought a ⅛ for $50 where I live.”

“I'm in love with this strain. It burns so nicely. Not too fast, or not too low. It's a good steady pace to give you a good high. For me, the high fluctuated between body and head. But it usually depended on how much I consumed. 

If you need a strain to keep you at a functional high throughout the day, I recommend this one!”
“One of my favorites. Feels like it lasts a bit longer then others. Always uplifting.”
“it tasted like a tangy flavor, also a very nice head hi had me vibing out and feeling all happy”
“Definitely thought it was a classic and good strain. Indica dominant, but makes me have a good time when I'm with friends.”

“its FIRE!!!! the stuff i smoked was 25.8% thc!!!!!! helps with pain, depression, anxiety!! its good for everything! and heres a tip for experianced mediators, take 5-HTP supplement and it will do wonders for tolerance.”

“The classic (ocean grown) kush strain found all over the west coast of America. Whether or not you get the real thing probably depends more on region than anything else. Most legit shops should have this one in stock. Just make sure you check the batch date and get something somewhat fresh.

I'll have a full review of OG Kush over on Stuff Stoners Like.”
“Favorite strain!!!”

“An over anticipated strain. It was good don't get me wrong but I found myself packing 3 bowls to get a good high (top shelf) and I don't have that high of a tolerance. It's taste is a regular pine/skunk smell. I'd rather go with a Sativa then this but that's just me. A good part about it however is it really dank.”
“always makes me happy”
“This strain worsens my anxiety unless mixed with an indica or good hybrid. It certainly causes munchies galore, which I don't care for personally.”
“One of my faves for sure...no couch lock so I can still go about my day and get things done”
“Can get any better it's OG that's all I have to say”

“I can't get over the taste it leaves its different .. the feeling is even  50 50 mind and body...... feels very uplifting if it's a good batch  after maybe an  hour or two you'll feel the comedown nice and slow .. ........................................the taste tho.....................”

“Overall very good strain sativa aspect quite apparent with 1 or 2 hits more you smoke you start to feel the heavy indica affects attributed to the Hindu Kush lineage. Beautiful light crystaly dense buds with mouth watering piney kush aroma and taste, legendary strain.”
“one of the best!”
“absolutely  hands down my favorite  strain”

“Very tasty, super uplifting but not at all overwhelming. An incredibly creative, fun and social smoke, doesn't make you tired or super stoned... cool for a more sensitive or not every day smoker. Nice THC %, and although low CBD (which I like for the medical benefits), it's good to go!”
“Ok but made me paranoid a little”
“Best to smoke before you go to bed or if you have a hangover.  You must keep this in a mason jar at all times because it is very pungent.”
“OG kush has an unforgettable high would recommend for New patients.”
“Early onset, good well rounded but short lived kinda high. Overall a pretty decent smoke.”
“Gives me a happy high and helps my back pain. After a while, I'm ready to head to bed.”

“One bong rip = couchlocked. Super heady. Absolutely perfect.

12 bucks a gram @ Green Room, $7.50 at Limelife (the nugs at Green Room looked better IMO).”
“Loved it”
“one of the best top strains in my opinion”
“yum yum yum”
“Intense body high. Lemony taste, makes you feel really good.”

“Amazing. Great pain relief, and relaxation. Head feels light and mind is awake. Oregon Legalization is a great thing. 29.6% and a fair recreational price. I never would have imagined ten years ago this would be possible!”
“A real favorite... I realize it's all to taste but to me this is a gold standard for strains ... This gives you SO much of the good thinks about smokin' bud... You can't go wrong here.”

“Tried this strain a few days ago and its a good strain not to strong not to mild perfect for first time patients. If you take a few puffs a few mins at a time you will feel good, sometimes once even know you took a lot of puffs from the smooth high, but once you take a lot of hits within a 10 min span you will get a little head high which sucks and a unbalance ride.”
“Enjoyed the overall feeling.”
“Smoked this out of a waterpipe at a houseparty. The strain didn't make me lazy at all. Gave me a lot of giggles and euphoric happiness. I will defenitely smoke this one again soon”
“Nice long high, you really get the best of both worlds and the smell is one of a kind man lol kinda trippy high too”
“OG KUSH is up there but personally a bit rough on the smoking.  I suggest edibles on this one.”
“Smells nice and pine-y, lots of giggles. It just makes me so sleepy so it isnt great to do early on in the night.”
“This strain is one of my favourites, green, crystal-covered buds creating a long-lasting and enjoyable high.”

“Always will be one of my favorites... I have smoked a lot of different strains of bud. OG Kush never disappoints. Great for stress and pain. Very tasty with a nice Combo of more body than head high!!! Will always be the Bo Jackson of bud!!!”
“awesome strain. smoked a bowl of it about an hour ago. I feel all warm & fuzzy inside!”
“Best strain out! Great taste great high great feeling. Idk why but my batch tasted like maple syrup and smelled like it when burned 👌🏾”

“Pretty great strain to be honest, not the best taste but it definitely smells dank, also has a very heavy hitting high great for anxiety and depression, This is my favorite weed strain I definitely reccomend it im smoking on an ounce of it right now haha.”
“Great taste and affect. The color and densatie is extremely decent.”
“This strain is DANK! Super fresh smelling, and good taste.”
“What can I say?! It's OG kush!!! The legend!!. Easily one of my favorite strains”
“Killer”
“Really strong head high, super relaxed, &munchies too💆”
“Not a good experience; it made me dizzy and anxious, and I haven't experienced anxiety from cannabis since the last time I smoked brick weed. My friend enjoyed it though, so it might just be me.”
“This was some good weed but ive had better.  It was a solid balance of head and body high.  It did give me a headache though sometimes.  Overall a solid strain.”

“I smoked 1 blunt of OG Kush and it put me onto the floor. Nice body high and calming effect on the mind.  

You might get groggy and sleepy after the high is gone - but just smoke more and you're good to go!”
“It's hard to go wrong with a classic like this one. Turn any rainy day into a fun excuse to stay indoors and just chill, either alone or with friends, and switch any frown back upside down.”
“a solid staple”
“Packs a little punch you can fell in your eyes gives you a nice relax uplifting high worth a try 🙃”
“very relaxing”
“This taste amazing!”

“This is one of my 'go-to' strains.  I have PTSD and pills have not helped my night terrors.  This strain really relaxes my stress level and helps me get in a relaxed and sleepy mood,  It helps the night time flashbacks more then the pills I have tried.”
“Very nice head high. Nice strong smell.”
“It is my favorite kush in the world. The feeling and the taste is something else!! You gotta try this!”
“Taste great and is always great”
“Probably my favorite tasting flower very distinct taste you will know on the first hit whether it is real og it is fire all of the og strains are awesome”

“Great strain, nice woody, piney smell. I enjoy the relaxed, happy feeling. 

Smooth 💨 

Recommend 👍”
“Cooking the Kush the right way brings all of its smoking effectiveness in a discreet package that brings the ruckus if you can wait! Patience is a virtue.”
“Smoked a few grams over the last month. It comes in nice but leaves me sleepy in the end. It would be wonderful for nights when I just can't get to sleep. Also it's a bit pungenty for me.”
“smoked 2 fat blunts with my friend at a kick back and this strain had me feeling myself after 5 hits i was having an insane body high ogk a good strain for a chill day”

“If you get the real thing, which for me was only once, it's phenomenal. perfectly trimmed, cured and crystallized. tastes sweet, with that awesome hashy kushy taste smell too it. The high is really perfectly well balanced and lasts 2 plus hours. It's a special occasion strain for me and newbies or anxiety prone should use in extreme moderation as it's easy to overdo it because it's so potent but even then this strain...”
“perfect to sleep”
“The strain I got was ok.....it is a decent smoke nothing outstanding for me...🤔😕😕😕 I wouldn't run out to buy it again💵💸”
“second time you smoke this, it hits waaay softer, which is nice. youre not completely paralysed but instead get really giggly and happy it's great”

“Perfect strain for relaxation without the couch lock.  The first strain I have tried and I never felt out of it, or tired, just incredibly relaxed, content.  Smooth smoke, not harsh at all.  Great for just hanging out in a mellow situation without the sleepiness.

2nd time update:  For me this continues to provide mellowness but i get big headaches after that are tough to go away.  Will not be continuing this one”
“What else can be said about this staple of cannabis? Total earth taste, super heady buzz. Stress crusher for real. I can smoke this all day long and totally maintain. Love it!”

“Just smoked a half gram of High Altitude's OG Kush.  The joint was rolled with ultra thin zig zags.  The OG Kush smelled lemony and piney.  When smoked, the taste was subtle and almost appealing - tasted like lemon pepper.  OG Kush provides the high I'm always searching for.  It hits after about ten minutes and has lasted 90 minutes so far.  Its definitely a head high so far, but I can feel a lot of pain relief in my...”
“Nice strains ever”
“This one made me too anxious and the positive effects did not overcome that sativa trait.  I wound up mixing it with Superman OG to take the edge off and that made a great combo in other ways, too.”
“Strong sour smell Tasty mellow relaxing”
“A really nice knock-out" strain. Great for relaxing and listening to music!”"
“I love OG, It's the perfect high, you feel it in your head then get hit with a nice body. Nice thick DANK buds you dream about.”
“Most def a nighttime strain. Very loud!!!”
“give me a huge migraine it was a spliffin OG horrible toast as well”
“Definitely makes me feel super happy but it gave me insomnia, I've been sleepy hair all day.”
“Classic good ol og. Get the right one and youll be on your ass.”
“you can never go wrong with this stuff. got a couple g shipped from the west coast and it was definetly some of the best shit out there.”
“It got me high...”
“personal favorite”
“This strain is so incredible!!!!”
“Good mellow head high strong hitting and long lasting.”
“I think it goes without saying, but og kush live resin is bommb.”

“Wow, what a head rush. Smoked a joint, tasted like cap and didn't really feel anything when I was done. About 10 minutes later Wham! Great euphoric high!

First time trying this legend. Smoking for over 20 years, and really can't say for sure if I'd had this before, never really concerned myself with strain types when buying from dealers. Recently got this from a dispensary that's opened near me. Great stuff.”

“This was the first REAL medical strand I've smoked, straight from Colorado. It's an absolutely fantastic high. No paranoia, lasted hours... totally relaxed and insanely easy to stay focused, super easy to LOL, this is def a favorite.”
“Great buzz. Steady high. Feel it in your mind and body. The perfect hybrid.”

“Rocked it with this strain. Serious heady high brought on about 20 minutes after taking it. The buds are some of the strongest smelling I've had in a while. Overall would recommend highly to anyone looking for an uplifting but very head oriented high! Happy toking!”
“Very nice experience, helps me keep focus and adds a nice layer of euphoria to it. Smooth taste that's not too overpowering. Can definitely feel those sour notes, you can't go wrong with this one.”
“Mellow high. Really potent thou. All around happy. I ducks with this.”
“An amazing strain, it deals with pain and depression very well, as well as helping with loss of appetite.  I wish there was more background info available though.”
“This review is really from 9/7, when I did the closet, but I was too focused on that to focus on doing this.”
“Always been good. One of the common ones and always a pleasure. Feels pretty energetic, music is always good on it. I was pretty tired after my workout and this feels great now.”

“smelled and tasted like a car tire. I took 2 hits off the vaporizor and then waited 10 min.  Took 2 more and waited another 10.  On the third hit, I felt a slight lift.  Starting to feel a heavier stone at 15 minutes in.”
“Long high, great plant!!! Not my new favorite.”

“This is probably the best og I have found in a collective. The nugs are small and dense with a dark color and sticky wet when you pull it off. You don't need much of this strain to feel it. Packed a small amount into my bong and it hit hard. The kush is really tastefull and makes a great high. Best I've had”
“Used by many famous people. Good high over all”
“Smells like bbq when you burn it. Hits harsh but really, really strong.”
“Really good made me really hungry but also very happy”
“OG is still my all time favorite strain. Makes me super happy and giggly. I honestly can never stop laughing or smiling whenever i smoke it. Freakin amazing.”
“Best shit ever”
“Og is Og Not To Fond Of It smoked way too much”

“This rating is based on a combination of OG Kush and Cheese strains. WHat I did was packed a bowl with a few small nugs of Cheese and sprinkled OG Kush keef on top. Roasted it, and 3 hard hits, and I am dancing and can't get enough out of life! I think this is a beautiful blend of Cheese and OG Kush.”
“Overall, this is an enjoyable strain. It can be a bit intense at first, but tapers off well and lasts a long time.”

“Awesome strain! One of my favorites. Though it is known for being a great sativa strain I got a great indica hit from it too (as well as a great stress relief).  Do not pass this up its a great balance between indica and sativa. Must try!”

“Probably my favorite weed up to this point. Pretty quick on the timing and its very tastey weed. wrapped it up in a blunt and shared it with a few of my niggas and had a blast. This is a great strain and i highly recommend it (pun intended) haha. Lil baked from some shake and rex hits from it in my bowl too lol. Good weed for a Good time.”
“Its decent but I will always choose Master Kush over this for an any time smoke.”

“I enjoyed the OG Kush.
Smoked two bowls and got right fried.
The onset of the pasties was pretty fast, as well as the paranoia seeing as I was sketching out thinking my roomie was going to walk in while I was using his bong. (he's a dick). Other than that, really fuckin' high.”
“Really good. Probably my favorite.”
“Great batch this time around.”
“I suffer from extreme migraines to the point where I can't function on little tasks. This strain has eased them back to the point where I hardly feel them”
“MORE MORE THEN MORE”
“Great quality!”
“just finished a slice of og nugs were huge and dense great strain”
“Cheap and good.”
“Great for everything”
“got this right now, gonna be floating on cloud nine with this stuff”
“I love OG kush first off but I would smoke it everyday. It is a strain that you smoke every now and then to change things ups but over all very effective”
“King of all kush. Mixes perfect with anything. Buy by the bag.”
“I felt like I was walking around really fast and got a super uppity high with lots of talking and giggling”
“I feel awesome, and want to go out and do something!”
“best (not highest) high ive ever had, will buy again as soon as i get the chancw”
“K-Town Will Blow you're mind out its super legit Get it because Time is $$$$”
“Really nice high. I would say it's more uplifting than relaxing. But very euphoric and happy effects.”
“Now I understand why alot of rappers smoked that when they were teens.”
“Happy euphoric & uplifted. Everything around me sounded like a song I was amazed at everything! Best free joint I ever smoked!”
“favorite strain though u get hungry as hell!!:-P”
“OG Kush I got was so nice and green. Super dank and gave me a very nice high that just made me feel super relaxed and happy. Great strain.”
“Sturdy smoke.  Body high.  A tad harsh on the throat.  All over pain relief.  I got the munchies hard.  Aroma:  Orange & woody On exhale:  Woody musk/men's cologne & pledge Peace & enjoy”
“Yo this shit is definitely my favorite strand. shit put me to sleep. -jamal”

“Great oil.
Good to smoke throughout the day, use it through out the day  for my headaches.”
“Amazing. Best I have ever had.”
“Honestly OG is my favorite type of weed... It's so original" nothing taste like OG... The smell is out of this world fresh. You won't be disappointed.”"

“Tasty buds full of flavor to the ashes. gives a sudden rush of euphoric high in the head and then rushes down into the body high one might need for pain management. This kind of bud is great for the relax effects it brings however the high lingers into a stimulus effect after a few minutes of smoking a bowl or two.”

“OG Kush is a strain I would get tattooed on my sleeve. It has a really good earthy blend and the effect immediately soothes and takes your body to a rendezvous escape. WATCH OUT for cons who try to sell you OG Kush that's really not OG Kush. Best bet is to just get to Cali.”

“OG Kusy is one  of the main building blocks to so many of our all time favourite marijuana strains.  You know when you have OG kush because of its naturally dense bud structure that is unlike any other strain of weed ive came across except maybe Ambrosia.  OG Kush is, and will always be a top shelf Kush that can rival any other strain of marijuana.”
“This strain is good for a variety of symptoms, also tasteful and strong.”
“Pleasant taste as well as a pungent odor. Very nice euphoric mellow high, great for a relaxing time.”

“One of my all time favorites. Growing up on the west coast this was a strain you were familiar with at an early stage. Heavy pungent smells and flavors with a mellow heady effect. The only strains more favorable are usually hybrids crossed with it.”
“Grade A.”
“its realy good 4 MS”

“OG Kush is the first strain I ever smoked. This is a strong strain leaving me stoned in only 5 hits! I remember my first time like it was yesterday! I was happy and giggly with a powerful body high, I felt like I was flying haha. Everything was so mellow too. It also left my room smelling like pinesol, just thinking of this strain I feel like I can smell it from here! Perfect strain to be chilling on the couch watchi...”
“It gets me superrr high and it gets rid of all symptoms i have but makes me very lazy. Probably better to use for sleep.”

“Its a strain good for you if you're adhd. OG is more sedative type of bud so it can put you on your ass if you're of a chiller vibe type. While me and my cousin have bipolar and severe adhd so it helps us out a lot with how much energy we have on a daily basis”
“Good body/head high. Very dense bud”

column4: anxiety

column3: “Also in my top 4 list. Man, kinda rough the first time but now its pretty much always on deck. The mellow high that still lets me function, strong smell that greets you, and the sour but sweet taste. Yea deff one of my favorites.”

“OG kush is to marijuana as Bob marley is to reggae. If not thee most popular Strain, OG kush is a classic. Buds are hairy, dark, and dense.”

“I don't really smoke Pre-rolls, but I had this pre-roll and I must say it was very very smooth and the effect hits you like a blur in a sense. Explanation it hits you slow, but instantly, yet smooth all at the same time. You will be relaxed before you know it and the taste as I said is smooth. Can't go wrong with this Pre-Roll.”

Had some more at night with both a bong and a vaporizer. After this I got very sleepy instead. Vaporized and smoked very nicely, was pretty smooth and tasted above average.”

“Ocean grown or Old Gangster its still the KUSH. If you smoked more than 5 J's in your life, you know the Rep. This stuff is like walking on clouds. If I had one thing to smoke the rest of my life this would be in the top 5. I'd find away to sneak some of this shit in, simply because its what I do.”

“Strong, earthen, heavy duty. Those craving a super stoned experience should start here. So psychedelic that I'm left snapping my eyes open as I fall asleep as if I have closed-eye visuals... Dense, beautifully cured bud grown indoors by expert Eugene gardeners. MMM....ZZZ...”

“OGk one of my favorite strains. Not the best for pain, which I mostly look for but real good for coming home from work and relaxing. I took a couple days off from smoking and went back to my OGk and It was the first time I had heard my heart beat in a while. If not cured completely, you usually don't get any Keefe and your grinder tends to get messy and sticky AF. Still one of my top 10 hybrid strains. I recommend to...”

“Initially I was really relaxed, which lead to happy. Then, it got to be a little too much and I became paranoid. It's definitely not a weed I'd want to walk around and smoke, or be around people I don't know. It's for relaxing in a comfortable spot. Which is what I was doing and why I rated this a four.”

“Solid 5 stars. I quite possibly got higher on OG Kush than I'd ever been. It is most definitely in my top 3 and quite possibly my favorite strain. If you can get some, then GET IT. It will NOT let you down. Great head high, makes you feel light and very happy. It was just an amazing strain to have all around.”
“The smell and taste are mediocre.  The effect is light at first and intensifies over the following moments into body relaxation mode.”
“I really like it. It took me about 4-5 big hits and I was pretty high. It definitely made me go to sleep! All my finance issues went away and it's a great stress reliever.”

“Surprisingly I hit with a brief moment of anxiety, which is a rare and almost unheard of occurrence for me, however it only lasted for about 5 minuets, after this I was able to fully relax with a heavy body stone and uplifting cerebral effects! Nice tasting strain with a long lasting high!”

If you have too much then you'll definitely pass out but it's a pretty mellow high. I'd buy again if I want somethin...”

On OG, taking ...”

column4: what a rush"...45 minutes into it

great for chillen' with the homies”

Not much flavor on the smoke either, but like I said it doesn't hit yo...”

“This strain proves to be an oldschool pungent sometimes sweet mostly earthy slightly berry, think og kush with a sativa soaring high, tingly body. I feel like I'm back tracking or one step forward and one back; there's soo many great hybrids with sativa effect without tingly edge that all the oldschool strains induce.  So would only recommend if it's all that's available or maybe oldschool or tobacco smokers”

Recently paid $5/G for some, and I'm more than happy with it at that price.”

I prefer head highs more but for what it is this is a very g...”

as many reviewers have stated theres alot of different kinds of OG kush, its very great when your dispensary comes across a nice one.    but much like pizza even when not so good OG kush still delivers”

I use this interchangeably with White Rhino and Pure Kure, with a preference for the latter two.

Not in my top ten, but I will smoke it. :D”

good yeild

If you got a lot of friends and only a small bit of bud, this is your choice. Holds well and long in a doob. Dry mouth, hot smoke. Definitely a long slow high. Mellow, not for people in a rush. Would smoke at a camp or party...”

“I was personally only able to enjoy this high after smoking a lot, verses a little. 
When I smoked too little, it gave me bad dry eyes (as every strain typically does for me) and made me want to sleep because of that. But the sleep was deep and restoring.
When I smoked a lot, I felt I had a lot more energy and was able to get a lot accomplished. It was extremely relaxing and I felt little to no anxiety while high.
My...”

With a moderate yield and such a great result OGK in my opinion could be a growers dream. depending on your opinion of the strain I suppose. The genetics are not q...”

column3: “did some like 2 hours ago, you only get crazy high like losing your balance and room spinning if you take like 2 or 3 joints. takes like 47 hits from a bong for me, and i did a single joint and i was excited and happy and just jumping around. depending how fresh it is, you can go into a buzz in one or two strong and huge hits.”
